links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (7,-11,5).
maple: g:=1/(1-5*z): gser:=series(g, z=0, 43): seq(coeff(gser, z, n)-n, n=0..31);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jan 09 2009]
mathematica: Table[5^n - n, {n, 0, 30}] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 3 x + 6 x^2) / ((1 - 5 x) (1 - x)^2), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 16 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
